data.title: Boy Abunda On Kris Aquino and James Yap
data.meta_description: Boy Abunda on Kris Aquino and James Yap - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Kris Aquino and James Yap continue to experience marital troubles according to talk show host Boy Abunda. Boy stated that Kris and James have yet to resolve their differences. Kris's marital issues prevented her from joining a charity event with Boy. Boy acknowledged the latest marital spat seems more serious than past incidents, though he did not provide details. Both Kris and James are trying their best to save their marriage, and remain a couple despite their current problems according to Boy.
